column1: Import the updated template file in search a journal.
column27: The file you import must be a CSV (Comma Separated Values) file. The name of your file should end with either _.csv_ or _.txt_. in the manual journey.

column1: Next journal date has already occured.
column27:
The *Next Journal Date* you entered has already occurred.

Journals prior to and including today will be generated when you *Save*.

column1: Cycle 3- 4.21 search a journal entry-Finding a journal without reference number
column27: To make this all the more infuriating, it seems you can't show journal number in the list of journals posted in the 'Manual journal' centre and the search there likewise doesn't allow you to search on journal number.
